meanings.definition: Funkias: a type of plant with large, broad leaves and clusters of bell-shaped flowers.
meanings.sent1: The funkias in the garden have beautiful flowers.
meanings.sent2: I planted some funkias in my backyard for decoration.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel tried to hide nuts under the funkias.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a garden of thoughts, each funkia representing a different idea.
meanings.sent5: The funkias swayed gently in the breeze, their leaves shimmering in the sunlight.

meanings.definition: Funkias: the plural form of the word 'funkia', referring to multiple plants of this type.
meanings.sent1: We visited a greenhouse that had many funkias on display.
meanings.sent2: The funkias in the park attract butterflies and bees.
meanings.sent3: The children played hide-and-seek among the tall funkias.
meanings.sent4: The field was a sea of green, dotted with colorful funkias like jewels.
meanings.sent5: The scent of the funkias filled the air, creating a peaceful atmosphere.
